title: ever since windows last update i've been Lagging without ping or FPS issues at all ..
body:
so i updated windows and suddenly every single game i am having the same issue ... lagging every few seconds , my ping has always been around 42 and my fps is around 160 .. its making the game unplayable ... such a frustrating issue, does anyone had the same issue or knows a fix for it ? please let me know i've not been able to play league properly for a while now ... 

system information in case you want to know: 
CPU: Ryzen 5 1600x 
GPU : GTX 1060 6G 
Ram: 16 GB 

if other info is needed let me know , thanks in advance

replies.body: If that only started happening after a Windows update, I'm curious if the Game DVR function was turned back on from the update and it's now hogging resources and slowing the game. Double check to make sure that's still disabled, and if so go ahead and run a traceroute to 185.40.65.1 check for packet loss.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=UtRQYWzO,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2017-11-23T01:53:24.398+0000)
>
> If that only started happening after a Windows update, I'm curious if the Game DVR function was turned back on from the update and it's now hogging resources and slowing the game. Double check to make sure that's still disabled, and if so go ahead and run a traceroute to 185.40.65.1 check for packet loss.

For Game DVR i already know of the issue it caused since they introduced it so i made sure it was disabled in setting and registry so its definitely not the problem, 

but traceroute was interesting now i have already made some ping/packet loss tests but to general sites and IP but this one didn't go smoothly, 
After the 8th hop it timed out for the rest ,if its packet loss just to league  what would the problem be then ?
have same issue since preseason game update, got even worse since last update. Lags guaranteed now >_<
Lol ya same here I made a post last night I have 1080 mobile and 7820hk never had a problem tell after ranked

I fixed my problem. After submitting a support ticket they told me to disable the windows game DVR, disable all startup services in task manager, and go to msconfig and hide all Microsoft services then disable the rest. I just played an aram game and my game was fine.

I wonder if anyone else is getting random disconnects from in game while no ping issues and no fps issues. i have a capped fps of 80 but it continues to run 140. ping is a bit higher than usual but its not spiking. i also used hextech tool, didnt seem to help. its really random too. it would happen in team fights and out of them. its only been happening since the recent update for me. it also likes to jitterly freeze every now and then. everything runs fine on my computer and it seems client uses a lot of cpu and memory while in champ select.

Same, ever since the update yesterday, I keep getting  lag spikes every 10 seconds, sometimes whenever I use an ability my fps just drops, I have a pretty good and new computer so I think this is a in game bug. Really frustrating and annoying.
